attributes.action: change the national anthem to Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would love the national anthem to be changed to this classic Queen song! It would be a tribute to freddie mercury and the rest of the band. This is a popular classic and i'm sure many people know the words already.I'm sure the Queen would appreciate a new song too because she has had to listen to the old one for so long! Please make my day and sign this petition.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
